# Protons precipitation map

# Output minimum: 1e-3
# Grid X-Axis (first row): local time [hours] from 0 to 24 with 50 equispaced bins
# Grid Y-Axis (first column): latitude [deg.] from -90 to 90 with 25 equispaced bins
